text:
Cellular Sales - Knoxville, TN

Help us make the process of selling a cellphone easy. Along the way you'll get to deal with the challenges of replacing a fast growing companies legacy software without bothering the customers and sales people.

We're looking for junior/mid-level developers, a configuration/release manager, and a leader for our QA department.

We use mostly .NET, but we're also exploring our options and no technology is off the table.

Contact steve.barbour@cellularsales.com
